dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand Under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 2004 12:21 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Demand Under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act]

For your review.
-- 
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Demand Under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act
Date: Wed, 15 Sep 2004 14:19:33 +0100
From: Emma Davies <emma@loverboysusa.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Date:
15th` September 2003

Return address:
www.loverboysusa.com
emma@loverboysusa.com
Antarctic dot com Ltd
PO Box652 Swansea  SA4 OZD United Kingdom

Demand Under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act

Name of infringer:
http://www.sexosms.net
http://www.galeriadevideos.com
http://www.placervirtual.com
http://www.sexovip.net/


Dear Lance Crosby, Esq
A webpage hosted by your service, designated
(http://www.sexosms.net
http://www.galeriadevideos.com
http://www.placervirtual.com
http://www.sexovip.net/), retrieved 9th`September 2004 time
10.21a.m infringes upon my exclusive right in http://www.loverboysusa.com. I
have attempted to resolve this directly with the account holder without
satisfaction. Please remove the referenced material from your service 
and take
other appropriate action against the account holder to prevent future
infringement.
Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, this letter serves as 
actual
notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings. The information in
this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, I state 
that I am
the owner of an exclusive right infringed by the specified material.
Please contact me promptly to confirm the action you have taken.


Referenced material:
http://www.sexosms.net/index.php?seccion=despedidas
http://www.galeriadevideos.com/index.php?seccion=despedidas
http://www.placervirtual.com/index.php?seccion=videosporno&tipo=despedidas
http://www.sexovip.net/

All iamges and movies in the center of these pages.



Sincerely,
Emma Davies
Antarctic dot com Ltd
